name: Black Soldier of Rome: Browser
description:
Black Soldier of Rome is a free third person action game set in ancient Rome.

Game Features:

  •  Exciting action  sword fighting gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • For fans of hack and slash / Beat em up games
  • Suitable for both female and male players
  • Beautiful environment

Windows version with higher graphics:

https://hammergamesb.itch.io/black-soldier-of-rome
